job_description:
Responsibilities: Provide safe Pick & Drop service to employees according to the designated route and schedule. Operate Manual Hiace vehicles with skill and caution. Complete daily checklist of the vehicle (brakes, lights, tires, fuel, engine oil, etc.). Maintain cleanliness and regular servicing of the vehicle. Maintain records related to fuel usage and mileage. Immediately inform the authorities about any accidents or mechanical issues. Be prepared to take on additional responsibilities or work on different routes in case of emergencies. Maintain respectful, professional, and responsible behavior with passengers.

Requirements: Valid driving license (professional license preferred). Must have at least 3 (three) years of practical experience in driving manual vehicles. Special experience in driving Hiace or similar microbuses preferred. Should have a good understanding of road safety and traffic laws. Must have integrity, punctuality, and a responsible mindset. Should have a mindset to work overtime or extra hours as needed.

Responsibilities: ‚ú≥Ô∏è Job Summary
The General Manager will be responsible for the overall management, operational control, compliance, financial oversight, and business growth of the company‚Äôs three mobile retail shops dealing with imported mobile phone sets. The role requires strong leadership, integrity, discipline, and experience in administration and governance.

üõÑ Key Roles & Responsibilities
‚úÖ Business Growth & Planning
- Develop detailed strategies, action plans, and timelines to increase the company‚Äôs products and services and expand business operations.
- Identify opportunities for business improvement, operational efficiency, and sustainable growth.

‚úÖ Operations & Team Management
- Oversee daily operations of all three mobile shops and ensure smooth workflow.
- Lead, manage, and supervise shop managers and staff, ensuring discipline, coordination, and performance improvement.
- Conduct regular shop visits and performance evaluations.

‚úÖ Customer Care & Service Excellence
- Ensure high-quality customer care services across all outlets.
- Maintain strong relationships with customers and resolve major complaints or disputes professionally.

‚úÖ Inventory & Asset Control
- Monitor inward and outward movement of mobile phones and accessories.
- Ensure proper documentation, IMEI records, stock registers, and prevention of stock loss or misuse.
- Verify inventory reports and ensure transparency in stock management.

‚úÖ Financial Oversight & Confidentiality
- Oversee all financial transactions of the company, including sales, expenses, cash handling, and bank deposits.
- Supervise loan disbursement and recovery (if applicable) in accordance with company policies.
- Maintain strict confidentiality of all financial transactions, records, and sensitive company information.

‚úÖ Compliance & Governance
- Ensure compliance with government regulations, customs documentation, VAT, tax, and company policies.
- Maintain proper records to support audits, inspections, and regulatory requirements.

‚úÖ Staff & Customer Welfare
- Ensure customers and office staff receive all benefits, facilities, and entitlements as per company rules and policies.
- Promote ethical practices, fairness, and professionalism within the organization.

‚úÖ Reporting & Coordination
- Prepare and submit regular operational and financial reports to ownership/management.
- Coordinate closely with accounts, operations, suppliers, and other stakeholders.
- Report risks, irregularities, or operational issues promptly with recommendations for corrective action.

Preferred Candidate Profile
Age: 25-65 years
Background: Retired Army / Defense / Banker / College or University Teacher / Government Service
Strong leadership, integrity, administrative experience, and decision-making ability

Requirements: ‚úÖ Required Documents Updated CV / Resume Recent passport-size photograph Photocopies of educational certificates Photocopy of National ID (NID) ‚úÖ Required Qualifications & Skills Masters or equivalen

Responsibilities: Responsibility:
1. Collect orders from customers in the market.
2. Communicate with customers to provide product information and prices.
3. Record orders after confirmation and report to the office.
4. Provide delivery and payment information related to products to the office appropriately.
5. Search for new customers and try to increase sales according to market demand.

Requirements: Qualifications: Passed Secondary School Certificate (SSC)/Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) Experience: Previous experience is good, but freshers can also apply Skills: Good communication skills Respectful and professional behavior Punctual and active in the market

Why join MetLife as a Financial Associate? Your hard work and skills will quickly lead to opportunities for advancement. Financial Associate ----> Unit Manager ----> Branch Manager Financial Stability Achievements: 1. Quick start to earnings after joining 2. Annual average earnings of 40 lakh taka per person among top 50 performers 3. Annual average earnings of 20 lakh taka per person among top 100 performers, along with other bonuses 4. Special recognition and rewards for exceptional achievements. Opportunities for Fulfilling Dreams: 1. International and domestic travel 2. Recognition at international conferences 3. Medical coverage for family 4. Provident fund 5. Education scholarships for children Potential for Rapid Success: 1. World-class training facilities 2. Skilled trainers 3. Digital workspace 4. 100% online-based programs 5. Digital tools for sales and activity management Opportunities for Own Business: 1. Opportunity for personal business without any investment 2. Opportunities for rapid advancement based on performance, leading to roles as Unit Manager and later Branch Manager 3. Opportunity to start an agency in your own name 4. The selected candidate will be responsible for editing videos, creating motion graphics, and producing engaging visual content for digital platforms, marketing campaigns, and promotional materials.

- Stay updated with the latest video editing trends and technologies

- Resolve excellent storytelling and visual sense
- Strong organizational and time management skills
- Ability to work independently and in a team
- Creative mindset with a passion for video production
- Marketing-related experience will be an advantage

Responsibilities: Core Responsibilities
- Handle day-to-day accounting (cash, bank, petty cash, journals)
- Prepare event-wise budgets and track actual vs planned cost
- Manage vendor bills, advances, and final settlements
- Issue client invoices and follow up for payments (this is critical)
- Maintain receivables & payables reports

Event-Specific Duties
- Control event-wise expense tracking (fabrication, manpower, logistics, F&B, artists, etc.)
- Verify vendor quotations, PO, and bills before payment
- Ensure on-site cash disbursement is documented properly

Financial Control & Compliance
- Maintain VAT, Tax, TDS records
- Assist in monthly closing & audit support
- Ensure company policies are followed in spending
- Maintain proper bill files & digital records

Coordination & Reporting
- Coordinate with Project Managers & Operations team
- Prepare profit/loss reports per event
- Submit management financial reports
- Support decision-making with cost insights

Tools & Skills Expected
- Strong in Excel / Google Sheets
- Knowledge of Tally / accounting software
- Good understanding of event costing
- Detail-oriented, deadline-driven mindset

- Strong knowledge of basic accounting principles
- Hands-on experience with Tally / accounting software
- Excellent command over MS Excel / Google Sheets
- Ability to manage event-wise costing & expense tracking
- Knowledge of VAT, Tax & compliance (practical, not textbook)
- Experience handling vendor bills, payments & client invoicing
- Strong attention to detail and accuracy
- Ability to work under tight deadlines & pressure (events don‚Äôt wait)
- Good communication & coordination skills
- Honest, organized, and responsible mindset

Optional (Adds Extra Value)
- Experience in event management / advertising agency
- Knowledge of petty cash & on-site cash handling
- Understanding of budget control & P/L reporting
